thread.title: Nova H. of Michigan
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by Nova H. of Michigan

author: Nova H. of Michigan
title: Nova H. of Michigan
text: I loved my wig so much that I ordered a second one right away! Unfortunately I don't have the option of whether to sport a a wig or wear my own out respectably. So I have to keep wigs in stock my my needs. The wig is so natural looking and feeling. In addition to the product I am so impressed with the delivery time of my orders from Elevate Styles. They are very quick in a matter of 2 days I have my hair! Thank you! You are are so great!
